sentence: That bill now heads to Governor Mike DeWine for signing into law.
author: Bob Adelmann
title: Indiana, Georgia, Alabama, Ohio Could Soon Allow Constitutional Carry

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine signed a bill that eliminates a concealed carry permit requirement for Ohioans ages 21 and over who are legally eligible to own and carry a firearm in the state.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: Ohio Becomes Latest State to Allow Concealed Gun Carry Without a Permit

title: Making It Easy to Carry a Concealed Gun Is Absolute Madness
